com.majeur.preferencekit

Class RadioPreferenceGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.preference.Preference
      • android.preference.PreferenceGroup
        • com.majeur.preferencekit.RadioPreferenceGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<android.preference.Preference>

    public class RadioPreferenceGroup
extends android.preference.PreferenceGroup
    Preference group that holds a list of linked radio preferences. It is the same purpose as a RadioGroup widget. Persisted value is the index of selected radio button. RadioTitles must be set through xml or code, summaries and icons are optional.

    • Nested Class Summary
